DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to investigate the influence of epidermal growth factor receptor mutations on the efficacy of erlotinib and gemcitabine in metastatic pancreatic cancer.
DOC.brief_title: The Role of EGFR Mutations in Pancreatic Cancer Patients Receiving Gemcitabine With or Without Erlotinib
DOC.detailed_description: The influence of EGFR mutations on the efficacy of treatment with and without erlotinib in metastatic pancreatic cancer is to be determined.
